page.title: 04FINE FARE SUPERMARKET
page.content: FINE FARE IS THE LARGEST CONVENTIONAL SUPERMARKET IN HIGHBRIDGE. LOCATED ON THE MAIN A38 THROUGH THE TOWN.THE SHOP HAS ITS OWN CUSTOM BUILT BUILDING.THIS SHOP HAS A LARGE FRONTAGE FACING ONTO THE MAIN STREET,AND AT THE REAR IT HAS IT'S OWN LOADING BAY AND A SMALL CAR PARK.IMMEDIATELY BEHIND,IT HAS THE MAIN CAR PARK IN HIGHBRIDGE. FINE FARE SELL'S IT'S OWN BRAND OF FOOD IN A YELLOW COLOURED PACKETS OR TINS.IT ALSO HAS A FRESH MEALS AND CHEESE SECTION ASWELL AS A FRESH FRUIT AND VEGATABLES SECTION.IT IS ONNE OF SEVAL SUPERMARKET'S IN THE GROUP FINE FARE HAS QUITE A LOT OF COMPETITION WITH NORMAN'S A BIG CASH'N'CARRY JUST DOWN THE ROAD.FINE FARE IS MUCH BETTER FOR PRESENTATION WITH A BIG WINDOW DISPLAY.FINE FARE PROVIDE'S A GOOD AND HELPFUL SERVICE FOR THE PEOPLE IT ALSO PROVIDES JOBS.
